commit.message:
locale.cc: initialise __ret with zero


2001-03-02  Peter Schmid  <schmid@snake.iap.physik.tu-darmstadt.de>

        * src/locale.cc: initialise __ret with zero
        * src/strstream.cc:cast gptr to int_type

From-SVN: r40188
